Hindrances -- Female Human Novice Fighter
Attributes (3 Points):
Agility: d4-1 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d4 Strength: d8-1 Vigor: d10-1
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Elderly+: -1 Agility/-1 Strength/-1 Vigor
Obese: -1 Strength step (worn gear)
Young+: -2 Attribute Points
Young: -1 Attribute Points
Anemic: -2 Vigor (resist disease, sickness, fatigue, and environment)
Timid+: -2 Spirit to resist fear and Intimidation
Skills (13 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4-4 Notice: (sma) d6-1 Stealth: (agi) d4-2

Fighting: (agi) d8 Persuasion: (spi) d4-4
Language (Common): (sma) d8 Science: (sma) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Common

Hard Of Hearing+: Deaf; automatically fails Notice (hearing)
Hard Of Hearing: -4 Notice (hearing)

Outsider+: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Outsider: -2 Persuasion (other races)

Thin Skinned: -2 vs. Taunt

Habit: Has irritating but harmless compulsion

Illiterate: Cannot read or write
Impulsive+: Always acts without thinking

Loyal: Always takes risks for friends
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Mute+: Cannot speak

Obligation: Has regular responsibility that occupies 20 hr/wk

Outsider+: Strangers are unfriendly or hostile
Overconfident+: Has excessive opinion of own capabilities
Phobia+: Suffers -2 on trait rolls in presence of phobia subject
Phobia: Suffers -1 on trait rolls in presence of phobia subject
Poverty: Starts with half funds, loses half funds each wk
Quirk: Has minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Secret+: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from major trouble
Secret: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from minor trouble

Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt

Combat

Elderly+: -1 Pace/-1 Run
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Obese: -1 Pace/-1 Run step/+1 Toughness
Slow+: -2 Pace/-1 Run step
Slow: -1 Pace/-1 Run step

Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Arrogant+: Always takes on the biggest threat
Bloodthirsty+: Treats foes cruelly; never takes prisoners
Can't Swim: Moves 1/3 Pace through water
Hesitant: Uses lowest of 2 Action Cards
Martial Flexibility: May gain benefits of combat edge for 5 rd 1/encounter
Pacifist+: Will not fight living creatures, uses nonlethal methods only in defense
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option available
Ruthless+: Attacks any who impede personal goal
Ruthless: Attacks those opposing personal goal
